description: General clinical rules for common symptom patterns and conditions

rules.name: Pneumonia Pattern
rules.recommendation: ‚ö†Ô∏è **URGENT MEDICAL CARE** - Seek immediate medical evaluation. Pneumonia requires antibiotic treatment and monitoring.
rules.clinical_notes: Higher risk in elderly and immunocompromised patients

rules.name: Possible Malignancy Pattern
rules.recommendation: ‚ö†Ô∏è **URGENT EVALUATION NEEDED** - Constitutional symptoms require comprehensive workup including labs and imaging.

rules.name: Diabetes Mellitus Pattern
rules.recommendation: üìã **MEDICAL EVALUATION NEEDED** - Classic diabetes symptoms require blood glucose testing and medical evaluation.
rules.clinical_notes: Classic diabetic triad - requires glucose testing

rules.name: Urinary Tract Infection
rules.recommendation: üìû **MEDICAL EVALUATION** - UTI symptoms require urinalysis and possible antibiotic treatment.
rules.clinical_notes: More common in women - can progress to pyelonephritis if untreated

rules.name: Pyelonephritis Pattern
rules.recommendation: ‚ö†Ô∏è **URGENT MEDICAL CARE** - Kidney infection requires immediate antibiotic treatment to prevent complications.
rules.clinical_notes: Upper urinary tract infection - can cause sepsis if severe

rules.name: Migraine Pattern
rules.recommendation: üíä **HEADACHE MANAGEMENT** - Consider migraine medications and trigger avoidance. Seek medical care if pattern changes.
rules.clinical_notes: Classic migraine features - rule out secondary causes if new onset

rules.name: Asthma Exacerbation
rules.recommendation: ü´Å **RESPIRATORY CARE** - Use rescue inhaler and seek medical care if symptoms worsen or don't improve.
rules.clinical_notes: Can rapidly progress to severe exacerbation requiring emergency care

rules.name: Panic Attack Pattern
rules.recommendation: üß† **ANXIETY MANAGEMENT** - Consider relaxation techniques. Rule out cardiac causes if recurrent or in older patients.
rules.clinical_notes: Diagnosis of exclusion - rule out cardiac and medical causes first
